dict.acceptation: 呼喊，叫喊；高声说或发出喊叫声；

sent.orig: Compare cry, shout, yell and scream.
Compare cry (out), shout, yell and scream.
sent.trans: 试比较cry (out)、 shout、 yell、 scream的用法。

sent.orig: Shout after shout came from him, and the others began to run in his direction.
sent.trans: 他叫了一声又一声，惹得其他人都向他那边跑去。

sent.orig: Shout after shout greeted hi m as he climbed upon the bank.
sent.trans: 他爬上了岸，欢迎他的欢呼声此起彼伏。

sent.orig: Shout what shout, quiet a little, you on earth have what thing?
sent.trans: 这句翻译为：“呼喊什么呼喊，稍微静止，你在地球上有什么事物”？
